name: Slack Lower-Contrast Dark Mode (Discord Style)
description: A lower-contrast dark mode skin for the browser version of the Slack chat app, based on the colours of the browser version of the Discord chat app.
additional_info:
This style is meant to replicate Discord's lower-contrast dark mode. it is HEAVILY based on Slack Night Mode (Black) by lacour @ stylish.org: https://userstyles.org/styles/117475/slack-night-mode-black .

To install:
1) Get the Stylus (preferred) or Stylish (less preferred for privacy reasons) add-on for your browser:
     firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/styl-us/
     chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne?hl=en
     opera: https://addons.opera.com/en/extensions/details/stylus/
2) Refresh the page
3) Click "Install Style"

---

I blurred out most text and images out of privacy, but left a few places unblurred so you could see the contrast.

---

Tested on Chrome. Technically works on Firefox too, but less prettily.

---
